description: Design a best-selling product using AI
title: Product Design Studio | Pietra
introduction: Pietra offers a range of services for businesses, including product design tools, access to vetted factory networks, storage and fulfillment solutions, storefront and print-on-demand services, email and influencer marketing, data analytics, and more. The pricing options include monthly, quarterly, or annual payments with the flexibility to upgrade as needed.
features: Access to 1:1 experts for your brand
pricing: Pay monthly, quarterly, or annually. Upgrade anytime as your needs change.

faqs.question: Which plan is right for me?
faqs.answer: Pietra offers different plans tailored to various business stages, such as Full Service for all-access pass, Launch & Grow for operating and growing a business, Launch for beginners, Design & Sample for planning product lines, and Grow for essential Shopify apps at an affordable price.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan?
faqs.answer: There is no minimum commitment with Pietra, and you can change, pause, or cancel your plan anytime.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free account to browse the platform with no credit card required. Additionally, a 14-day trial is available for analytics and software tools.

faqs.question: How often will I be billed?
faqs.answer: Billing options include monthly, quarterly, or annual payments with discounts for quarterly and annual billing to maximize savings.

faqs.question: Does Pietra work with my existing store?
faqs.answer: Pietra supports integration with leading storefront platforms like Shopify, Wix, and WooCommerce, and manual order entry for other platforms.

faqs.question: Can Pietra help me design my website?
faqs.answer: Pietra provides storefront listing on its marketplace and lists freelancers for logo and website design services.

faqs.question: What if I need more help?
faqs.answer: Pietra offers resources in its Education hub, including guides, workshops, and a community to assist entrepreneurs in getting started.
